item.title: This Report Says Most People Don’t Have ‘Quality Jobs.’ Here’s How Your Business Can Change That
item.description: Getting the right balance of pay, reliable scheduling, and employer support can make any job better, and boost employee engagement.

item.title: Going Global? How to Hire Ethically While Growing Your Business
item.description: Successful overseas hiring means fair pay, not breakneck cost cuts that harm local workers and economies.

item.title: Everyone thinks AI is replacing factory workers, but Amazon’s layoffs show it’s coming for middle management first
item.description: As Amazon slashes 14,000 white-collar roles and the U.S. approaches a million job cuts this year, AI’s first major labor casualty might be emerging.

item.title: The 1 PTO Policy So Bad It Should Be Illegal
item.description: Unlimited PTO sounds great, but this twist on an already suspect policy is horrible.

item.title: A Delta Flight Was Landing Late and Passengers Were Anxious. What the Flight Attendant Did Next Was Brilliant
